sentences.en: ...a storeroom filled with massive old furniture covered with dust.
sentences.cn: ...一间堆满了尘封的大件旧家具的贮藏室。

sentences.en: All the goods in the storeroom need to be transferred to another.
sentences.cn: 这个库里的货物需要全部倒仓.

sentences.en: Before this, express company people it is evening goes storeroom pick upgoods.
sentences.cn: 在这之前, 快递公司们都是晚间去库房提货一次.

sentences.en: Bin card will be maintained for each item in the F & B storeroom.
sentences.cn: 餐饮部 仓库中各个物品应设立货卡.

sentences.en: He returned to the storeroom and closed the door after him.
sentences.cn: 他回到堆货房,关好了门.

sentences.en: I walked to the storeroom, hung the weight on the toilet chain.
sentences.cn: 我走进堆房, 把秤砣挂在水箱链条上.

sentences.en: I'll just check if there are any more in the storeroom.
sentences.cn: 我要核实一下仓库里是否还有存货.

sentences.en: Our storeroom is too small, it can hardly hold anything.
sentences.cn: 我家的储藏室太小, 几乎放不了什么东西.

sentences.en: She imagined it had once been used as a storeroom; anyway, it was now quite forgotten.
sentences.cn: 她想它以前可能是个小仓库, 反正现在被人完全遗忘了.

sentences.en: The shopkeeper had a large amount of oranges in his storeroom.
sentences.cn: 店主在货仓里存有大量橙子.

sentences.en: The storeroom held the trunks and other household stuff.
sentences.cn: 储藏室里放着衣箱及其它家用物品.

sentences.en: The storeroom was choked with furniture.
They decided to turn the shelter into a storeroom.
sentences.cn: 他们决定把防空洞改造成储藏室.

sentences.en: They decided to turn their shelter into a storeroom.
sentences.cn: 9他们决定把防空洞改造成储藏室.

sentences.en: Those items will be stored in the storeroom in a separate shelf.
sentences.cn: 这些物品将在仓库中另架保存.

sentences.en: When Harry went to sea, his things were boxed up and put in the storeroom.
sentences.cn: 哈利出海时, 把东西都装了箱,放在了贮藏室里.

trans.tran_en: a room where goods are stored
